text:
Hi Guys,

I am looking to get a developer account to work on the Integrations we provide with HubSpot. Can I get some help to create a dev account ?
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/get-started|https://developers.HubSpot.com/get-started>
Thanks <@UBT0AHWLD>! I was actually referring to that article specifically not mentioning those settings.
<@U01QVR44MEY> and <@U03D3A76XHB> thanks for the help here.

The customer essentially have three different warehouses (each. have a tax rate, shipping cost, and price per product) They are looking to leverage a deal based workflow + cca to pull in the proper CO along with the properties of the deal record to run a calculation for total $ and create a new property on that deal record.
hey all, anyone free to help me figure out how to use these private apps.
Sure, do you have any particular questions
well, last time i did any codding was in the early 2000'
so im pretty much useless with all the updates. Ive built the app on HubSpot
i think correctly. now angi is asking me to give details about where to send leads. its asking for the webook url which isnt really on HubSpot
and thats where i get totally lost because i dont know the work around, and if im being honest, i dont have the time to dive into the forum to figure it out
also, THANK YOU in advance for any advice or help
and, if there is a private app already available for angi pro ads integration ill just use that
So you want your leads from angi to get put into HubSpot
yep!
i have the access integrated sync feature on. if im correct, thats all i should need
I was going to do it through sapier, but i figured this would be easier
Honestly I think Zapier would probably be the easiest way
Let me look at the angi HubSpot sync real quick though
did you find one? i checked the marketplace and didnt find an app that was already built
I previously thought there was one but after looking it doesn't look like there is one
You could setup a serverless function but that might be a little overkill
i think it would too. even zapier doesnt have an angi integration... thats kinda crazy AF
You could just use the webhook in zapier to catch the data from angi
I can hop on a call and help you set it up if you want
thatd be awesome! can we call through slack, i was reading stuff
Sure

I have an A/B testing question - let me know if this is not the right channel for this.
What is the best way to TEMPORARILY turn off a “B” variant? Do I have to go into test results, declare “A” the winner, and then use the “rerun this variation” for the “B” variant later when I want the test turned back on?
or is there a better way to do this?

Hi all! I have a problem with my oauth application. I made an integrations years ago and suddenly get this error when my customers try to connect to HubSpot. Anyone here can point me in the right direction?
It used to work, and nothing is changed on my side. All fields are correct (client_id, secret etc). This stopped working a couple of weeks ago

Hey. im trying to get HubSpot to update/change my contacts on google. can i get a little help figuring that out? im just low on time and would really love if someone could hold my hand through this lolol

Hi everyone - I’m wondering if anyone can help:

I have a Husbpot form embedded on my webpage. When I view the form in the HubSpot preview page, the “Date of Birth” question appears as MM/DD/YYYY but when I embed the form on my (wordpress) website, it switches to showing a date picker widget instead.

Any ideas how I can keep the MM/DD/YYYY format even when the form is embedded on a page?
i figured it out!
Hello all, regarding the new CRM card this is super easy to add things like image, text etc. Do you know if this is possible to add charts or we can only use the pre-defined types ?
You can add statics, but no charts...
Here's an example statistic
<@U01QVR44MEY> thanks for your answer. I saw that this is possible to use stats because this is one of the defaults components. So this is not possible to use other components that the defaults ones?
No currently you can't build custom components, or embed iframes for that matter
You can have a modal popup up an iframe though
thanks a lot!
For sure

I try to use a custom property in a custom quote template. I thought first I just use {{ ticket_order_number }} for instance in the template to get the value, but that does’t really work. Does it has to pulled over the API?

Hello everyone, I am dealing with an issue where my GA event tags are not firing via GTM on HubSpot landing page forms. My event listener tracks just fine when the form is submitted via WP page with HubSpot form embed. However for improved tracking we're moving to HubSpot only landing pages and that's causing a whole host of issues.
